detaileddescription.para: The file path associated with the currently opened project.

The layer tree model object, used to keep track of details such as layer visibility, selected map theme, etc.

The active layer for the currently opened project.

The snapping enabled state for the currently opened project.

detaileddescription.para: This class stores current projection information such as extent and map theme in order for those to be saved and afterwards restored when the project is re-opened.
